greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Counts of unique periodic binary strings of length n.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..2000
Achilles A. Beros, Bjørn Kjos-Hanssen, Daylan Kaui, The number of long words having a given automatic complexity*, 2018.
formula: a(n) = 2^n - Sum_{d|n} mu(n/d) 2^d for n>0, a(0) = 0.
a(n) = 2 * A178472(n) for n > 0. - _Alois P. Heinz_, Jul 04 2019
xref: A050871 is bisection (even part). - _R. J. Mathar_, Sep 24 2011
results.author: _Jin S. Choi_, Sep 24 2011
